TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Oro’raw_, title = Oro’raw_, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oro’raw_} }

S.FORM: Oro'raw: Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Oro'raw: a niyaro', 40 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 108 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 97 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat 77%, Tayal 11%, Amis 2%.

Oro'raw: Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Oro'raw: a niyaro', 40 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 108 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 97 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Saysiyat 77%, Tayal 11%, Amis 2%.
